OOC: Pardon this OOC. You know, I was thinking, why do the groups seem so d=
isjointed in NBW? What's the problem? Why do they not seem like a family an=
d instead seem like they're all over the place? I looks at the Maximals and=
 I look at the Predacons and I realize the truth. LEADERSHIP. Pardon the ca=
pitals. The Maximals and Predacons lack leadership. A leader that will ackn=
owledge each and every one of the bots on the team and make sure they're al=
l in action keeps the RPG running smoothly. You all know I'm right. So what=
 happened to the leaders? Is anyone going to take command of the groups? Ta=
ke this under consideration. You all know I'm right, I repeat. I'm king. An=
 annoying king, but king nonetheless...
